suggest.ext-pcntl: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.ext-posix: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SQS queue driver and SES mail driver (~3.0).
suggest.doctrine/dbal: Required to rename columns and drop SQLite columns (~2.6).
suggest.fzaninotto/faker: Required to use the eloquent factory builder (~1.4).
suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Required to use the Mailgun and Mandrill mail drivers and the ping methods on schedules (~6.0).
suggest.laravel/tinker: Required to use the tinker console command (~1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (~1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-cached-adapter: Required to use the Flysystem cache (~1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-rackspace: Required to use the Flysystem Rackspace driver (~1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-sftp: Required to use the Flysystem SFTP driver (~1.0).
suggest.nexmo/client: Required to use the Nexmo transport (~1.0).
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the beanstalk queue driver (~3.0).
suggest.predis/predis: Required to use the redis cache and queue drivers (~1.0).
suggest.pusher/pusher-php-server: Required to use the Pusher broadcast driver (~3.0).
suggest.symfony/css-selector: Required to use some of the crawler integration testing tools (~4.0).
suggest.symfony/dom-crawler: Required to use most of the crawler integration testing tools (~4.0).
